Office Hours

  • Regular Office Hours: We will have several in-person office hours per week, starting from the 2nd week of the course. These office hours are open to any enrolled students (including SCPD students) who are able to attend them in-person.
  • SCPD Office Hours: In parallel with the in-person office hours, TAs will be available also over video chat (link is posted on Campuswire). These are only for remote SCPD students who cannot attend office hours in-person.
  • Schedule and location: check the calendar below. All TAs will meet in the Huang Basement (in front of the NVIDIA Auditorium).
  • Evening and Weekend office hours: office hours late in the evening and during the weekend are open to all the students, but we kindly ask you to leave a preferential lane to the SCPD students or those who have schedule conflicts. As such, if there are other office hours you can join comfortably, please try to avoid the evening and the weekend slot.
  • Queuing: we use QueueStatus to manage more efficiently the queue of students waiting for a TA.

Import as Google Calendar or in iCal format to keep track of all the course events (Lectures, Homework, Office Hours, etc.)
